name: @arc-ai/outline-bot
description: Outline to S3 document sync service

scripts.build:container: SEMVER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && SHORT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -f Dockerfile -t ghcr.io/oa-labs/arcai-outline-bot:${SEMVER}-${SHORT_HASH} ../..
scripts.push:container: SEMVER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && SHORT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && docker push -q ghcr.io/oa-labs/arcai-outline-bot:${SEMVER}-${SHORT_HASH}
